definition: to display (one's potential, one's talents etc)
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.chinese: 上海世博盡展綠色服務理念。

sentences.english: They are encouraged to develop their academic strengths to international standards.
sentences.chinese: 政府鼓勵各院校盡展所長，發展最出色的學科，達到。
